title: Covid-19 global updates: Britain's daily infections could reach 100000 this summer, health secretary says
content:
1. Covid-19 global updates: Britain's daily infections could reach 100000 this summer, health secretary says  The Washington Post
  2. BREAKING: Fully vaccinated people won't need to self-isolate from mid-August  Sky News
  3. Here's what could happen if the UK hits 100,000 daily COVID cases  Yahoo News Canada
  4. The proposed relaxing of Covid restrictions in England has sparked a social media meltdown from ‘new abnormal’ enthusiasts  RT
  5. There could be 15000 unnecessary Covid deaths by January – and Boris Johnson will blame you | Sean O'Grady  The Independent
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Covid-19 global updates: Britain's daily infections could reach 100000 this summer, health secretary says  The Washington Post
BREAKING: Fully vaccinated people won't need to self-isolate from mid-August  Sky News
Here's what could happen if the UK hits 100,000 daily COVID cases  Yahoo News Canada
The proposed relaxing of Covid restrictions in England has sparked a social media meltdown from ‘new abnormal’ enthusiasts  RT
There could be 15000 unnecessary Covid deaths by January – and Boris Johnson will blame you | Sean O'Grady  The Independent

localize.title: Covid-19グローバルアップデート。英国の1日の感染者数は今夏に100000人に達する可能性があると保健省長官が発表
Covid-19全球更新。英国卫生部长说，今年夏天英国的日感染人数可能达到100000人
Covid-19全球更新。英國衛生部長說，今年夏天英國的日感染人數可能達到100000人
